about_the_game:
background


  • , you're lucky to have entered the Internet security office.

  • work is very simple, you only need from news website, delete illegal comments, you'll get a reward.

  • but the law is somewhat blurred, you have to carefully refer to the law, and speculate on the true intentions of the superior.

  • superior advise you remain faithful, it conducive to the work and understand the law more effective.

about


This is an anti Utopian game. You play a network worker who is responsible for deleting the illegal comments in the news everyday.

While I was making this game, I had been thinking about how to express, but I did not give up the effort of the game, but unfortunately, the game was not at last able to make a state of satisfaction.

Almost all news and reviews in games come from life. Some are forgotten by us, others are happening.

The game contains a large number of text, and we must read these words to complete the game. If the players feel bad about this, please choose carefully, sorry.

name: 尺子和橡皮

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows7
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Core2Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Safety and stability in Britain are especially important. You are lucky to enter the Internet security office. This is a great opportunity to dedicate to our motherland. In the increasingly bad network environment, you have to check and delete the illegal comments in the news, so that the UK keeps its purity and beauty every moment.
